org.red5.server.messaging

Class PipeConnectionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.red5.server.messaging.PipeConnectionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class PipeConnectionEvent
extends EventObject
    Event object corresponds to the connect/disconnect events among providers/consumers and pipes.
    Author:
    The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Steven Gong (steven.gong@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
